item.title: Repeating Keywords Wont Help SEO
item.description: It has been played around for a long time by many people claiming to be “SEO experts”, but Google has now given a final wording on the topic. Specific Keyword Density is NOT a ranking factor. In fact, Google has even gone on record to say that it does NOT even pay attention to keyword density! In the words of Matt Cutts, former spokesperson for Google, addressing the issue.
